text: For those interested in presenting - try to think up some topics you think you could present on. I wouldn’t go full on into creating a presentation yet, It just makes things easier to have some ideas flowing.

if meeting ends up difficult due to availability and what-not I’m available to atleast chat over slack and whatnot almost any time throughout the day - video conferencing is just harder to find time since you can’t multi-task as easily.(while I’m at work I have to keep my projects moving, we’re crazy busy so stopping during the day to video chat is a little harder, but can probably still be done. I am available though outside of normal business hours ( those being 8am to 5pm CST)
<@U7SL518D6> is the pinned google doc the most up-to-date one?
It is, though at the bottom of it there’s a current discussion of an alternate simplified version just in-case we can’t get everything we need
